invalidPassword: The password is incorrect. Attempts remaining:
userAbort: The transaction was canceled by the user. To confirm a transaction, hold the BitBox touch button for 4 seconds.
userTimeout: Timed out. To confirm a transaction, hold the BitBox touch button for 4 seconds.
notInitialized: The BitBox is not initialized. Use Shift Cryptosecurity's BitBox App to set up a wallet.
upgradeFirmware: Please upgrade to the newest firmware using Shift Cryptosecurity's BitBox App.
unsupportedFirmware: MyEtherWallet does not yet support this version of the firmware
